briefdescription.para: Constructs a Button object with the specified pin number.

parameterdescription.para: The pin number to which the button is connected.

briefdescription.para: Initializes the button with the specified pin, mode, and button level.

parameterdescription.para: The pin number to which the button is connected.
The mode of the pin (INPUT, INPUT_PULLUP, etc.).
The active level of the button (LOW or HIGH).

briefdescription.para: Reads the raw pin state for this button instance.

detaileddescription.para: Performs an XOR against the configured active level to return the logical button state.

simplesect.para: The logical state of the button (true for pressed, false for released).

briefdescription.para: Reads the button state and updates the internal state machine.

detaileddescription.para: Calls the parent VirtButton::tick() method to update the debounced/held state based on the latest raw pin reading.

simplesect.para: The updated state of the button (true for pressed, false for released).

briefdescription.para: Reads the raw pin state for this button instance and updates the internal state machine.

detaileddescription.para: Calls the parent VirtButton::tickRaw() method to update the debounced/held state based on the latest raw pin reading.

simplesect.para: The updated state of the button (true for pressed, false for released).

briefdescription.para: Sets the hold timeout for the virtual button.

parameterdescription.para: The hold timeout value in milliseconds. Default is 600 milliseconds.

detaileddescription.para:
Sets the step timeout for the virtual button.
timeout
The timeout value in milliseconds. Default is 200 milliseconds.
max timeout is 4000 ms

briefdescription.para: Sets the click timeout for the virtual button. Clicks faster than this timeout will be detected.

parameterdescription.para: The click timeout value in milliseconds. Default is 500 milliseconds. Max is 4000ms.

briefdescription.para: Attach a callback function to handle button events. The callback will be called when button events occur.

simplesect.para: true if the callback is attached, false otherwise

detaileddescription.para: Get the action corresponding to the current flag combination.

simplesect.para: The action corresponding to the current flag combination.

detaileddescription.para: Checks if the timeout has occurred.

simplesect.para: True if the timeout has occurred, false otherwise.

detaileddescription.para: Returns the duration in milliseconds for which the button has been pressed. If the EB_NO_PEDOMETER macro is defined, the function always returns 0. If the button is not currently pressed, the function also returns 0.

simplesect.para: The duration in milliseconds for which the button has been pressed.

detaileddescription.para: Calculates the duration for which the button has been held.
Checks if the button has been held for a specified duration.

simplesect.para: True if the button has been held for the specified duration, false otherwise.

briefdescription.para: Represents a button that extends the VirtButton class.

detaileddescription.para: The Button class provides functionality to read the state of a button, update the internal state machine, and perform initialization.
